LedgerX - New York, NY (Manhattan). Local or remote.

Join us to build the first US-based exchange for virtual currency derivatives.

Our culture is about compliance, quality and learning. Regulatory compliance is our top focus; we have a top-down culture of compliance. We value quality in software engineering. We operate at the intersection of law, finance and technology.

We have a Python, ZeroMQ and C++-based backend. We are looking for a software engineer who can build out features all the way to our React.js frontend.

Please email zach@ledgerx.com.
